main: ^Hello sir, we took action and proceeded not to aid the wildlife researchers with their invasive species problem, however from their request for help has given us an idea.You see our wastage and disposal unit can not keep up with the wastage, so we are proposing dumping some of the wastage in the river, or we can spend some money to make upgrades where need be. It will be costly though.
chosen: ^Very well, we will go with your option of
